Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.developmentCards

Class DevelopmentCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.developmentCards.DevelopmentCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardView
public class DevelopmentCard
extends Card
DevelopmentCard is one of 48 cards buyable by players.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()

    • isBuyable

      public boolean isBuyable​(Warehouse w, Strongbox s)
      Parameters:
      w - is player's warehouse
      s - is player's strongbox
      Returns:
      true if player has enough resources to buy this card

    • buyCard

      public void buyCard​(Warehouse w, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      w - is player's warehouse.
      s - is player's strongbox.
      choice - if 1, indicate that the resources in warehouse will be the first to be decreased. Else, strongbox is the first.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - thrown when there aren't enough resources. this method allows to buy a new card from the deck.

    • activateProduction

      public int activateProduction​(Warehouse w, Strongbox s, int choice) throws InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      w - is player's warehouse.
      s - is player's strongbox.
      choice - if 1, indicate that the resources in warehouse will be the first to be decreased. Else, strongbox is the first.
      Returns:
      the faith points of the card.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - thrown when there aren't enough resources. this method active the production of a this card.

    • increaseProductionResource

      public int increaseProductionResource​(Strongbox s)
      Parameters:
      s - is a strongbox which summarize all resources of production powers given to the player.
      Returns:
      how many faith points are given by the production power.

    • controlDiscardResource

      public void controlDiscardResource​(Warehouse w, Strongbox s, int choice, boolean isPowerProduction) throws InsufficientResourceException
      Parameters:
      w - is player's warehouse.
      s - is player's strongbox.
      choice - if 1, indicate that the resources in warehouse will be the first to be decreased. Else, strongbox is the first.
      isPowerProduction - if true indicate that i want to active a card. Else, i want to buy a card.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourceException - thrown when there aren't enough resources. this method control if there are enough resources in warehouse or strongbox. If yes, discard the resources.

    • discount

      public boolean discount​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - the specific resource.
      Returns:
      true if the operation of decreasing by 1 unit a selected resource is successful, else false. this method allows to decrease by 1 unit the amount of a selected resource.

    • recount

      public void recount​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - indicates the resource that i want to decrease the amount of. this method allows to increase by 1 unit the amount of a selected resource.
